event.title: Golden Wings
event.subtitle: A 50-Year Journey Through Aviation History
event.description: Golden Wings chronicles the remarkable career of Robyn Stewart, an American Airlines flight attendant whose 50+ years in the skies witnessed the transformation of commercial aviation.

theme.missionStatement: Honoring the fearless spirit that kept passengers safe across decades of flight.

values.title: Fearless Service
values.description: Experience stories of unwavering dedication from the cabin to the cockpit.

values.title: Trailblazing Legacy
values.description: Discover how Robyn Stewart paved new paths for generations of flight attendants.

values.title: Elevated Hospitality
values.description: Feel the warmth of a crew that treated every passenger like family.
